title: Is HC Verma good for clearing concepts? I want to ask about its theory content and examples for clearing concepts. - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no better book when it comes concept clearing other than HC Verma. The words he has used makes it easier to understand even if some one is not from science field. The difference between NCERT and HC VERMA is the words used in NCERT is way to complex than in HC VERMA and also the unnecessary information provided in NCERT makes it boring. Coming to level of difficulty of problems it obviously not needed for neet but I personally recommend it for JEE and AIIMS.
